data.text: SWISS will be adding six attractive new summer destinations to its Geneva-based route network from 22 June. The new services will operate to and from Ponta Delgada (on the Azores), Antalya (Turkey), Menorca (Spain), Djerba (Tunisia), Dubrovnik (Croatia) and Rhodes (Greece).
We are remeniscing about a weekend full of winter magic with our #LXmas family. ✨ https://t.co/qNCPNHDK5m
Little wrap up of yesterday's #LXmas flight to Lapland. Special thanks go out to our wonderful crew. ✈️💖 https://t.co/O1hVveL8uU

data.text: We met huskies, did some kick sledge sightseeing and tried our luck at ice hole fishing - we had it all. 🎣🛷 Even our lovely #LXmas crew enjoyed some winter fun. 👩‍✈️👨‍✈️ https://t.co/C9BlgpywFa
Welcome to Kuusamo, Lapland. 🇫🇮☃️ After a wonderful flight with our #LXmas, we have arrived in winter wonderland and are ready for some exciting activities. https://t.co/IYHEekMhu8
Our magical #LXmas flight. ✨ https://t.co/LmOsmrdnER

For the next three months, SWISS is offering a range of culinary specialties from the heart of the Canton of Grisons to its Business and First Class guests on long-haul flights. Chef de cuisine Frank Schuster conjures up seasonal dishes ranging from the rustic to the exclusive.

Today we celebrate the Samichlaus in Switzerland. 🎅🏻 Santa brings chocolates and little gifts to well-behaved children. And today he brought Rudolf too. Do you know any similar traditions in your country? https://t.co/zXgooYEUhm

Today is World Children's Day! For more than 15 years, SWISS has been collecting donations in all currencies on board to support SOS Children's Villages, thus providing a brighter future for children and families in need. Read more about our engagement on the SWISS blog.
"Expect the unexpected" - In our latest blogpost, Maître de Cabine Alexandra tells us everything about the daily challenges of handling a whole cabin at cruising altitude.
Somewhere over the rainbow… ✈️🌈 https://t.co/HlRvZ34tuo
SWISS travellers can now reduce their carbon emissions by purchasing sustainable alternative fuel. Customers will now find the Compensaid platform in the SWISS reservations portal.

data.text: The Lufthansa Group is to adopt a transparent and simple points system for its frequent flyer programme. In the future, long-term regular customers will also earn Frequent Traveller or Senator status for life.

SWISS asserts strength in a challenging market environment: In the first nine months of 2019 the adjusted earnings declined by 11 per cent from the same period in its record 2018. Adjusted EBIT for the Q3 period was 8 per cent above its prior-year level.

data.text: From November to December, SWISS will host the Flying Film Festival aboard its long-haul flights. During two months, the inflight entertainment will feature 13 varied short documentaries by young filmmakers from all over the world.
https://t.co/qciHI32uHu
Sunsets like these are the reason we love window seats. 😍 https://t.co/VoFQ8yNqVG

Flight update: After thorough inspections of all C Series aircraft, flight operations have been resumed on a regular basis this morning. We very much regret the inconveniences caused to our passengers. Customers in need of further assistance may contact our service team anytime.

Update 2/2: SWISS takes these incidents very seriously and continues to maintain close contact with the responsible authorities, Airbus Canada & Pratt&Whitney. The safety of our customers and crews is our top priority. We deeply regret the inconveniences caused to our passengers.

Update 1/2: After a comprehensive engine inspection the first C Series have already returned into service in perfect condition. Based on the current planning the flight operations can be resumed on Thursday in a largely regular manner.
Flight update: technical irregularities on various SWISS short-haul flights. If you are booked on any of the affected flights, please find more information here: https://t.co/tS0qbCIDcc

data.text: SWISS and Swiss Federal Railways (SBB) now offer customers a ‘Flugzug’ rail service between Lugano Station and Zurich Airport for travel on or after 16 October. More information: https://t.co/0Un1WKmY1c
Little sneak peek of what’s to come. ❄️ Are you more of a winter person or do you like to escape the cold? https://t.co/qZ7ip9G2rj
Lukas has been a flight attendant at SWISS for over five years. We are very excited to explore his world above the clouds. ✈️☁️
From 16 October onwards, SWISS will be offering a new service from #Zurich to #Ljubljana. There will be five connections a week initially, with a daily flight from 27 October.

Today is #WorldVegetarianDay 🌽🥒🥕 What better way to celebrate this special occasion than with the world's oldest vegetarian restaurant and our long-standing partner @hiltl? Read our latest blog post to find out how our seasonally changing vegetarian menu options come about.

Due to the Adria Airways insolvency, the flight operation Lugano-Zurich-Lugano can no longer be resumed. SWISS has to cancel all flights to and from Lugano. Find more information here: https://t.co/tS0qbCIDcc

data.text: #SwissDigitalDay offers a platform for discussing opportunities and risks associated with digital transformation. Any thoughts about how digitalization affects SWISS? https://t.co/LLCEKb0Vlc

It’s time for some technical insights. We have the pleasure to tag along with Andi, our Instagramer of the month in September. He’s a team leader within IFE Maintenance and will take us on his journey through the SWISS technical division.
Happy weekend everyone. ✈️ What is your next SWISS destination? Let us know in the comments. https://t.co/yCvn4eUqFB

Switzerland's Digital Day will take place on 3 September - an occasion for the aviation industry to reflect on digitalisation and to present the latest digital innovations from SWISS. Find out more about our innovations and digital projects in the current blog post.

data.text: After a career of 34 years, one of our most experienced pilots took his farewell from SWISS on 1 August in Vevey. In honour of the unique @fevi_2019, Robert Emeri had the pleasure of flying the colourful CS300 one last time. Merci Robert! 👨‍✈️✈️ https://t.co/EqcfOEMv4i

data.text:
"East or west? We have them both. ✈ As of March 2020 we will offer you two new long haul-destinations from Zurich:       Osaka, Japan 🌏 Washington, USA 🌎"
https://t.co/UrxHnVkgXt https://t.co/9FUXtsFUF1
🛫 Big news is waiting for you. Stay tuned. https://t.co/rtkjhULfTm

In August, it's all about the SWISS base in Geneva, as we have the pleasure of accompanying a cabin crew member from Geneva. Sylvain worked as PR Manager in Paris for the last 15 years and now traded his office job for a job above the clouds. Read more about him in our blog.
We all have that one travel buddy we make lifetime memories with. Happy International Day of Friendship! ❤️ https://t.co/DjVVyZ50Jz

For the first six months of 2019 SWISS achieved an adjusted EBIT of CHF 245 million. This makes a 24% decline from the record year of 2018. However, it was the second-best second-quarter performance in the company’s history.

data.text: Thousands of passengers, hundreds of flights, dovetailed connections and unforeseen events: all this is coordinated by the Operations Control Center at Zurich Airport. More about this fascinating and complex world of SWISS flight operations in our blog:
Happy weekend everyone! 😍 Don’t forget to tag us on your #flyswiss journey. ✈️ https://t.co/StHPhDxBaL

SWISS will be expanding its range of services from Geneva in the Winter 2019/2020 timetable period by adding a new route to Marsa Alam in Egypt. Read about further changes in the latest press release:
Happy weekend everyone! ✈️ Comment below if you know which aircraft type this impressive shot is showing. https://t.co/VNBUydD5MB
